website_summaries.verdict: Quiet, BPA-free filterless model is ideal to help you sleep through the night, especially with the 360-degree nozzle.
pros: Dial knob lets you control output
Automatic shutoff feature kicks in if tank is lifted or becomes dislodged
Easy to refill with one hand
Perfect choice for hotel rooms, bedrooms, and cubicles
cons: Power light is a bit bright if you’re using it at night
Some reports that tank has a strong plastic smell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my office, I can breathe freely!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cool mist humidifier for my office. The humidifier is small enough to fit on my desk and big enough to not have to fill up the tank every few hours. The tank lasted through my entire 8 hour day and into the next day without having to refill it. The air in the room is of a much better quality, I can breathe freely, I don’t feel congested all the time like I used to. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sun

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot with dryness in small room!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to help with dryness in a small room that i have, after putting it to the test i can say that the room is much cooler and doesn’t feel dry at all, the unit has a very cool look, it feels well built, filling up and puting it back in is very easy, like that you can grade how much output you need also move the direction of the mist, must say very happy with my purchase and it has solved the dryness issue in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Poor choice of humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Months later, I am still being harassed by the seller to change the review and they will pay me. Unless you want a bad humidifier and months of harassment, do not buy. Despite the seller sending me an offer for a free gift in exchange for a good review, I don’t recommend this humidifier. It leaves large puddles of water, needs frequent refilling and is difficult to refill. Much better choices elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Lbart09

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size humidifier that I was looking for. Very silent. Easy to set up. Took about 5 minutes. I’m using it for a Mass Cane Corn plant and some aloe plants to keep them healthy indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Carter

customer_reviews.title: cheap product.
customer_reviews.text: i rarely write reviews but i was so disappointed. it was GREAT the first two days. then started leaking. very very disappointed. cheap product. cannot even use it anymore. it’s hazardous.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Will just break after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: While this product is quiet and effective, the white breaks after second use. I had a white one before and thought it might have just been a defect, so I ordered another white one. Second use and it’s broken n spilling water all over. Don’t waste ur money
customer_reviews.author: nikkey

customer_reviews.title: Be careful not place near valuable items that aren’t water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working and began leaking after SECOND USE. Would absolutely not recommend especially due to the fact that it leaked all over an expensive electronic and ruined it.
customer_reviews.author: jayne van dorsten

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I would've rated zero stars if possible. Broke in less than two weeks of use. The plastic around the closure spout crumbled when I was trying to tighten it after the fifth it so use.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work and CS is terrible
customer_reviews.text: This review is for a replacement item after my first taotronics humidifier died within a week. The second was so loud we couldn’t use it. The company has been emailing me for months trying to bribe or emotionally manipulate (sob stories all from different email addresses) me into removing my first review. Don’t waste your money or time.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H. Best

customer_reviews.title: Great for a first humidifier! Easy to clean and use!
customer_reviews.text: I am just getting into the world of difussers and humidifiers and this one is a great start!! It makes ZERO noise and I love that the air coming out of it is cool feelinf-not warm or hot. Pros: -looks cute and minimalistic -mist is a cool temperature and has a nice flow -easy to fill up -easy to clean -instructions are EASY to follow -the warranty that comes with this product is awesome!! -definitely humidifies the room well! Cons: -More settings would be nice. Like on for an hour then off, etc. -Can't put essential oils in Ultimately, I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: After adding water, turned on and there’s no steam. Took apart, started over, added water again still no steam. Inferior product does not work. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Noon

customer_reviews.title: Good but would have changed a few things
customer_reviews.text: Good humidifier. I think it lasts a decent about of time. I’m just not a fan of how bright the light is (I have to remember to block it every night b4 bed) and I don’t like how the top piece where the mist comes out of doesn’t lock in place (not sure if mine is just a defect or if they are all like that). Every time I have to refill the water by tipping the unit upside down I have to hold it or if falls out. Not a big big deal, but annoying. Overall, its a good product
customer_reviews.author: M&A

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few days and then died
customer_reviews.text: Was in use for less than a week when the motor started making noises and then died.
customer_reviews.author: KB Starr

customer_reviews.title: Rust?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this humidifier for less than a month and it’s been working perfectly. The only issue is that what appears to be rust keeps appearing within the unit. I’ll wipe it down but it comes back after each use. I reached out to Taotronics support and received a generic response about tap water and white dust which is obviously not the problem I’m having. Like I said the unit works perfectly, but I’ve stopped using it because I’m concerned that it’s somehow broadcasting rust into the air. I haven’t seen any other reviews mention this so maybe I just recieved a malfunctioning unit.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A Tovey

customer_reviews.title: great humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I really like this humidifier. It's very attractive, quiet, and puts out a good amount of moisture. 3 things keep it from being 5 stars: 1. the all white design is very attractive but you can't tell how much water is left. An indicator on the tank would be nice. 2. it's very sleek - but there is no handle so it's not the easiest to lift off the tank for refills. 3. it would be more convenient to have an on/off button rather than dial definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P

customer_reviews.title: Loud noise after using for a few times....
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty good and easy to use. Small but enough to run overnight. Mold started to grow after use for two weeks though.... Updated review: after using for a couple of times, the humidifier starts to make loud noise.... it was so quiet when I just purchased it... now it really bothers me and we can’t use it when we are sleeping...
customer_reviews.author: Eric V

customer_reviews.title: Works but seems too easy to knock over
customer_reviews.text: Haven't knocked it over yet but still worried I might. Really seems top heavy and I'm always nervous around it if it's filled with water. UPDATE 4/28/20: Seller paid me $57 for a 5-star review. It's still a 3-star product. UPDATE 5/15/20: Seller emailed me and asked for me to remove this review in exchange for $40. UPDATE 5/27/20: Seller AGAIN tried to pay me $50 now to remove this review. UPDATE 5/30/20: Was contacted by seller yet AGAIN pleading with me to delete my review in exchange for money.
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival - Refunded
customer_reviews.text: The unit did not function when delivered. I followed the user manual exactly while filling it with water and setting it up for the first time. It comes on and makes a humming noise, and I can feel air coming out, however it does not use up any of the water. I followed the troubleshooting instructions in the product manual and was unable to get the unit to function properly. I have used it several times overnight and the water level has not gone done. After a few months I was eventually offered a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and compact
customer_reviews.text: Through the end of winter season, i caught a cold and lost my voice. The laryngitis was so bad, never in my whole life that I totally lost my voice, can't even whisper. Based on nurse recommendation, I looked for humidifier right away. Thanks to prime, it arrived the next day. I was on my third day of total lost voice when I start using it; air moisture from the cool mist helped soothe my throat, and helped me gaining my voice back on track in few days. This thing is easy to use, quiet and compact. I learnt hard through this laryngitis that I should always have humidifier at home to fight flu and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Dkpar

customer_reviews.title: broke after 1 month, no response from manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Humidifier has an aesthetic shape and worked fine for about 1-2 weeks, but after several days of use it developed patches of red bacterial growth (I assume klebsiella) that were extremely difficult to clean and malodorous. It stopped emitting a stream after about 1 month of use. Throughout the entire time I was unable to register my warranty with Taotronics even though the product claims to come with a year-long warranty because of technical difficulties with the website, and when I reached out to Taotronics multiple time after the humifier stopped working, I received no response.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I have horrible anxiety, insomnia, and asthma. When I got my humidifier today, put water and turned it on and it calmed me immediately. I could breathe easier and felt a calmer sensation which is super hard for me to achieve. I can’t wait to sleep with this on and have a peaceful night. It’s small, and very easy to use. Very modern looking as well! I’m very very pleased with my new humidifier. It also comes with a little brush to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: The unit is so hard to clean, so so hard, why???? There is a piece that is fused into place that catches all sorts of environmental grime and it completely blocks you from cleaning access right where you need to clean. And it needs to be cleaned every 2-3 days if you are using it constantly, which we are for an infant who sleeps 14 hours a day. The water capacity requires a refill every day at that rate as well - so really it is not worth the amount of effort needed to bend q-tips in half in order to reach inside the debris-catching chamber.
customer_reviews.author: Meta Fouric

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier on the market
customer_reviews.text: So I have several products from this brand and so far so good, same for this humidifier. My room is about 12m2 and it can works really fine because my eye and skin are no longer suffer from dryness. The design is also a good point because it can fit any place that I put and can match the theme of my room lol. For 1 full tank, it can last for about 4-5 hours on max and even last longer if you adjust to minimum operation. Overall, good product and I am not really care about durability because I know the customer service is beyond awesome as always.
customer_reviews.author: Nam N.

customer_reviews.title: The most suitable
customer_reviews.text: Huge water capacity for such a small diffuser. It has to plug into a USB port which limits the options for placement a bit, but the alternative is a conventional plug so it doesn’t make much difference. The instructions are straightforward. Fill with water and switch on. That will get you a continuous output of vapour. It’s such a good price it would make an ideal gift or a treat for yourself you don’t have to feel guilty about! It’s also so small it can be tucked away almost anywhere when not in use. And the cut out feature means you don’t have to worry about it running out of water.
customer_reviews.author: Iasha Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Great for my plants!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a humidifier to help keep my houseplants happy this coming winter, and I'm so happy I got this one! The design is lovely and not an eyesore. I love that I can rotate the spout at the top to direct the mist in a particular direction. The adjustable flow setting is also super helpful. In the winter I could crank it up really high, but on other days could leave it on low. I put this on a table right behind our couch and it's very hard to hear when it's running. Overall, nice looking, functional, and flexible humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Macaroni's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet and nice simple clean design
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this humidifier is great, especially the sleek simple design and absolutely NO noise at all... the only thing I wish is that it was bigger... the tank holds enough water to run all night in a small kid's bedroom on medium level... there's usually not enough water left over for another full night - it runs out during the night as I find the red light in the AM on the second morning... so it needs to be refilled often. I guess refilling it often keeps it cleaner as I can wipe it down with each refill.... Despite that, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Mist Vaporizer
customer_reviews.text: I have bought now three humidifiers off Amazon for a variety of reasons. This one I bought for myself and I could not be happier. I love the white color and compact design. It fits perfectly on my nightstand and provides a cool mist in my very dry bedroom. This humidifier is easy to fill and the mist is not overwhelming. This unit is very quiet and does not keep me up at night with humming. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a cool mist humidifier. The small design will fit in the smallest of apartments. We have a small condo and this is easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a smaller one for my desk at work. It's great but I knew I needed something a little more substantial for my bedroom. This is perfect. I have dermatitis on my face and it's worse in the winter with our heat on, etc. We filled this and it ran all night and only shut off in the morning. I feel different already. My face didn't itch at all and I don't feel all dried out. I would recommend. Easy to set up too.
customer_reviews.author: WestViewPark234

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This is a compact humidifier and it lasts all night with some to spare (my son sleeps 11 hours nightly). It is easy to fill (but you have to take it to the sink, can't fill while it's in place), sleek in appearance, and much easier to use and clean than a larger Vicks brand that I have. It fits nicely in an already-crowded nursery! The cool mist is nice, as it is not a safety hazard. It also has a diverter piece you can place in the top, and turn to direct the steam flow, which is nice. I'm getting one for the 2nd nursery! Have been using for about a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: Broken within a week.
customer_reviews.text: After less than a week of moderate use this thing no longer functions. Update: I am now getting spammed email offering to pay me (by "refunding" 50% more than the purchase price) take down my negative review. Avoid this product and this company!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D Harbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better humidifier not this one
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Humidifier stopped working less than a month. Don’t waste your time or money on this one. Buy a better humidifier that won’t die within a month. Chose this humidifier for its neat, sleek design. Was not disappointed. Easy to use and very quiet. I don’t hear anything at night at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiko

customer_reviews.title: Best gadget buy in ages!
customer_reviews.text: Love this humidifier! When I started getting morning headaches and the occasional bloody nose, I considered I should be adulting about the humidity level in my bedroom. It is noiseless and does the job in my perfectly. It puts out a great deal of mist for such a small appliances. I usually turn it on early evening and it lasts 12 hours. The result is better sleep, no more bloody noses. My dog asked me to send her appreciation for no static shocks to the nose when she's sniffing around for a good place to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Yackiw

customer_reviews.title: The most stylish humidifier I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: There are so many humidifiers out there but majority of them just DO NOT look good! This humidifier is so pretty, super stylish and chic. It has a water drop shape from the front. There is absolutely no noise when I use it on next to my bed. It helps with my allergies so well. It comes with a small brush for cleaning and it turns off automatically when water is low, which is very safe. A humidifier is absolutely a must-have when I use the heater during snow season.
customer_reviews.author: Yuli Aoki

customer_reviews.title: I love the ease of use and more...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased a humidifier and loved it so I started doing research for myself. I was in a major home store and shared that I was thinking about buying this one with a stranger who was also looking. After selling her on the features, I decided "hey, I think this is the one!", so I went home and ordered it. I really love it...it's super easy to use, quiet, easy to clean and looks good (although it doesn't take up much space). I appreciate that it's black and sleek in design. I definitely feel a difference in my hair, skin and nasal passage. Thanx.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: A must have for allergy sufferers
customer_reviews.text: If you’re like me, a victim to allergies basically all year round, then this is a must have for you. I decided to purchase after a bout of waking up feeling congested and dry from the neck up. I went with this one based on its sleek design and customer reviews and I am a happy camper. It’s easy to use and looks good in a room. The air is a cool mist and noise level is low enough that I barely notice it. I’m a light sleeper and it doesn’t bother me at all. After the few nights of using it I felt like a brand new person.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Not as quiet as it used to be
customer_reviews.text: After 10 uses, the motor has started to develop a rattling noise. Before it was whisper quiet. Still works but the rattling noise is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hsieh

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, elegant design; easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I needed a humidifier to help with my dry eyes and selected this one because of its sleek design, good reviews, and good value. The actual steam that comes out of this is not hot, so this product is not a significant safety hazard. When transporting the top part to refill, I've noticed that it tends to leak a little bit of water no matter which orientation I hold it, so I recommend keeping the base close by. Handling and operating this product is clearly laid out in the instructions. All in all, this is yet another solid product by Taotronics! I now own several products from them.
customer_reviews.author: Chi V.Top Contributor: Korean Beauty Products

customer_reviews.title: Bought twice/Broken twice
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this a 0 I would. Bought this product twice and two times it stopped working less than 3 months in. First time just stopped misting. Second time made loud grinding sound when turned on. I would clean it exactly as instructed to keep everything working but it obviously didn’t help. Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Fiorilla

customer_reviews.title: perfect for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it’s a great product and I’m happy with my purchase. The booklet said to not place it on a placemat, mat, or wood surface. Which I don’t understand because most people will place it on wood. Nightstands, dressers, desks..etc. So unless you have a metal or concrete surface to set this on, I may look elsewhere. I did set it on our wood dresser and haven’t noticed any problems. Size is perfect and barely makes any noise. The machine was getting a grey fog on it, but that was from the water we were using so make sure you buy water for it and not use tap water.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: A perfect tabletop humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this humidifier is so easy to fill and to clean. I use distilled water because the county water is so hard so cleaning isn't a big deal. What is a big deal to me, at least, is that it puts out a lot of humidity on a low setting. It will run maybe 12 hours before needing a refill. Filling it is very easy. I use a funnel because it is just easier if you're dealing with a full gallon of water. If you're filling it from the faucet, the funnel isn't necessary. This is a small but mighty humidifier that does NOT require a filter. Very easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Skylark

customer_reviews.title: No more nosebleeds!!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is suitable for small rooms. During the winter when we have heater on my kids are more prone to having a nosebleed. But when I use this product the kids don’t get anymore nosebleeds. When the product doesn’t have anymore water the product automatically shuts down. The price of this product is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Best Humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier surpassed my expectations! It is so quiet and very easy to fill. I love the size and look of this humidifier because it fits nicely on my nightstand without taking up much room. There's an adjustable dial and it lasts longer than expected. I had the dial turned all the way up and it was still running when I woke up in the morning (8 hours later).
customer_reviews.author: Jen M

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and performs well
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty bad allergies, and my doctor recommended several at-home solutions, one of which was using a humidifier. I know it sounds superficial, but I really wanted one that would look inconspicuously good in my room. This is the perfect solution! It’s sleek, quiet and perfectly humidifies the bedroom. My allergies have improved, though it could’ve been the combination of changes I’ve made. Regardless, I’m sure this will be a great thing to have during the dry, winter months as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Other uses other than for humans
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier to keep the humidity levels in my Dart frog habitats. This humidifyer puts out the perfect amount of mist for a 20 gallon amphibian habitat. Have it set with a thermostat to turn on/ff based on temperature. I really like the looks, size, color, ease of use, auto shut off if runs out of water, adaptability (being able to connect tubing). I know this is not what you advertise this humidifyer for but if I ever need one for those types of uses I will be sure to get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would have given 5 stars, but....
customer_reviews.text: It's really a great humidifer. So easy to use and to clean. Completely quiet. Cleared up my night time cough almost immediately. Couldn't be happier. I would have given this a 5 star review because the product deserves it. But the company, maybe not. Today, I got an offer for $10 to post a review of this product, which feels to me like they are buying reviews which they really don't need to do. Also, is this ethical? I would say not and I sure don't need $10 that badly.
customer_reviews.author: booklover

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use, and NO filter needed + easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love how sleek the humidifier looks from the front, and the knob controlling mist is awesome. The best part though, is that this humidifier needs NO filter and it runs for SO long without having to refill the water! My nose gets really dry at night, so I was looking for a sleek humidifier that didn't take up my entire room, could run all night, and also didn't require the need to purchase filters. That criteria is harder to meet than you would expect. This humidifier is awesome and meets all my standards. It comes with detailed instructions on how to clean it too. Super easy, just with household items you already have (white vinegar)!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hsu

customer_reviews.title: Top falls off easily - don't get if you have kids or cats
customer_reviews.text: Initially we were highly unsatisfied. This is a stupidly designed product. The top piece does not lock in with the bottem piece, and can easily be knocked off spilling water everywhere. If you have kids or cats you are guaranteed a wet mess. However, once we made our concerns clear they eventually provided excellent customer service and we are now content with how things went.
customer_reviews.author: Zvi Mowshowitz

customer_reviews.title: Works well but leaves layer of "soot" on everything in the room
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Excellent customer service. They contacted me about the "soot" (see their reply, which is very helpful information) and gave me a refund. I have 2 of these humidifiers. One of them seems to have no control over how much humidity it produces. Occasionally both will make grinding noises when they are almost out of water, which is not what anyone wants to hear in the middle of the night. Worst of all, both humidifiers leave a layer of what looks like soot all over the room. It's on the walls, the dresser it's on, a mirror across the room. It is too late to return these items, so I will be get rid of them.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Flinn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always struggled with allergies and my nose being congested, so I decided to buy a humidifier! This one worked very well! I put it in my room and turn it on when I get home from work all through the night! When I refill it with water it works perfectly and lasts me half day and all through the night! My allergies have gotten better and my nose doesn’t feel so clogged! My mom never complains that my room is stuffy anymore! Really enjoyed!
customer_reviews.author: Paula and Minh

customer_reviews.title: Straight forward and simple
customer_reviews.text: This is my second humidifier from TaoTronic. Got this for the office so the small foot print is perfect. Reason I picked this again is for the noise level. It is absolutely quiet and efficient. A simple knob to adjust the amount of moisture coming out. Will probably end up putting this on a smart switch too so I can schedule auto on/off. So far, I didn’t need to fill water constantly, it’s a small office but this totally did it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: DVA

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little too easy to knock over
customer_reviews.text: Great for bedrooms during winter months to prevent dry nasal passages and nosebleeds. I find the unit is not well balanced and is easy to knock over, however. And when you have one in your 5 yo’s room that can happen and does with regularity. I wish it were more rounded and squatty. Otherwise, works great.
customer_reviews.author: I do my research.

customer_reviews.title: Humidifers have come a long way
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this humidifer! It has a very modern look and blends in nicely with my decor. It is super quiet and will not keep you awake. Mines is aboout 4 feet from my bed. I love that you can set to stay on for a few hours or several. At night I set it to about 6 hours. The lights are cool but I don't use them since it would be a distraction at night. It's nice that you can set it without displaying lights so you can sleep. I will probably buy another for my family room. Buit in the bedroom it helps me from waking up with a dry throat.
customer_reviews.author: Delphine Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier for my daughter's room (4 month old) and it fits perfectly on her dresser and doesn't take up a lot of room, which is great since we have the changing mat on their also. With burning wood in our home this is getting it's workout for sure. It's quiet enough over the baby monitor that it isn't picking it up. I do fill it up each night but it's not completely empty either.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dehaan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and design humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is best for a many reasons such as Its very quiet and helps me breathe comfortably. I use it at nights on night stand and mornings on my office desk. Good design looks like a flower vase. Very classy. Very easy to refill water and also clean. Just follow the manual for the first time it clearly has descriptions with pictures showing the parts of the humidifier. My fav feature is auto off. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Love that it is quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this humidifier. It is very quiet which is a must for me when using this at night. My only complaint is that it takes consistent effort to keep it clean. The red/pink mildew growth comes up very quickly and in hard-to-clean places. The instructions say to descale and clean with bleach weekly, and I must admit that I haven't done this consistently. I empty it every day to let it air out, but notice that pink stuff showing up every 2-3 days. I haven't used other humidifiers to compare this to. Overall I'm pretty happy because it is quiet and functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think everyone should get this to help humidifying the air.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first humidifier purchase ever because I think its a must for baby, including adults. My niece loves it. It is not big so I dont have to worry she will knock it over when she is around. It doesn't take up too much space. The most important thing is its super easy to clean because its necessary to keep the air clean and moist at all time. Since my niece has sensitive skin and this helps her skin more at ease so it doesn't cracked or dry.
customer_reviews.author: Tenley L

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this humidifier for about 6 months and so far I'm satisfied with it. I put it on my nightstand and leave it on for the whole night. Most of the time I adjust it to the lowest level which already gives a decent amount of mist. For me the noise level is almost unnoticeable and I have no problem falling asleep with it on. Depending the water quality in your area, limescale can build up quickly over uses and you probably need to clean it with vinegar. One last thing: before you filling in water, remember to take out the nozzle part. I almost always forget and it falls out everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: When they say place on waterproof surface, they aren't kidding! Better yet, place a small fan behind it to better disperse the water, or you'll have water where it's sitting. This is not a defect, it is the nature of this type of humidifier. I still love it though. It gets really dry here in the winter. I get nosebleeds. This keeps my sinuses clear. We have very high iron in our water, and it's still working like new after a couple of months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Roxann Patzman

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little humidifier. To my surprise, I prefer the smaller size. It lasts about one night, but it's so much easier to refill and it's simple in nature which makes it easier to clean. I also like that it came with very simple and specific instructions on how to clean for mineral build up and how to sanitize. Basically, it's the most simple structure so you have less to clean. I also like that the button isn't bright and it doesn't seem loud to me.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet!!! Good mist output!!! Very satisfied overall!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through 5 humidifiers for the last few years and this is by far my favorite one. This one is soooo quiet. We turn it on during bedtime and can barely hear any noise. Mist output is also very good. The only thing I don't like about this is unlike others you cannot see the water level since the container is not clear. But it's not a big deal because it's just about right size for one day/night. I'm so glad I finally found a perfect humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and super quiet
customer_reviews.text: After a couple years of not using a humidifier, we decided we needed one again. We previously had used another brand, but I found the ongoing maintenance and additional filters needed were a nuisance, and ultimately it broke down after a year. I heard many people recommend the TaoTronics brand from a parents group I belong to. So we went ahead and got his model. This was the easiest humidifier we've owned. It's small footprint allowed us to put it bedside, and it really is whisper quiet. Cleaning it was super easy, I did not need any additional filters to prevent mold. In fact we went ahead and bought a second one for my son's room. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DaveM

customer_reviews.title: good item
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this humidifier is great, especially the sleek simple design and absolutely NO noise at all... the only thing I wish is that it was bigger... the tank holds enough water to run all night in a small kid's bedroom on medium level... there's usually not enough water left over for another full night - it runs out during the night as I find the red light in the AM on the second morning... so it needs to be refilled often. I guess refilling it often keeps it cleaner as I can wipe it down with each refill.... Despite that, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: o2bthin

customer_reviews.title: Appearance is a lie
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really have that sleek teardrop shape. The teardrop is just what it's profile looks like, if you lay on the floor and stare at it dead on. From the side (and any other angle) it is a long rectangular shape. The thing works great. Lasts for hours. It's quite. I love it. Just be warned it doesn't look like the pics.
customer_reviews.author: Brandonc123

customer_reviews.title: Pink mold buildup in narrow chimney impossible to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my newborn's bedroom. After 1 month the motor seems to have stopped working. There is a regular grinding sound now when I turn it on. I cleaned the machine weekly as suggested but pink mold still builds up in the chimney and it's impossible to clean it. Bottle cleaners don't fit and you can't get to the bottom part because the metal barricade doesn't detach. Everything is too narrow. Even the cap where the mist comes out is hard to clean because of the positioning of the plastic. This item is not worth the hassle of trying to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Oddo

customer_reviews.title: No mold, good size and sharp looking
customer_reviews.text: I searched a lot for a humidifier for my baby’s nursery that wouldn’t grow mold, I have had others in the past and always had that issue. This humidifier is easy to clean and as long as it does not sit with standing water in it there is no mold or mildew build up (at least as of yet I have been using nightly for 3 months). My baby used to have hard mucus in his nose and with using this that problem has gone away. It looks sleek and modern and is a good size (not too big like others) we have it in a smaller room but the output is sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Malinowski

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and easy to use humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier looks great on my kitchen counter. I’ve always had dry skin where I live so a humidifier was a requirement. I like the volume allowed in this humidifier, I can keep it running overnight and not have to refill it every few hours. It doesn’t make any noise so putting it in the bedroom would be a great option as well. I can control the amount of mist that it can defuse at any given point, which I really really like.
customer_reviews.author: ValH

customer_reviews.title: Small enough to be portal, big enough for humidity
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this product except two things: 1) The instructions say not to put it on a wooden surface; if you want this next to your bed, sitting on a nightstand (made of wood), you'd have to put something underneath it, like a glass plate. Now you have to clear the plate too. Annoying. 2) After a few days water collects in the bottom reservoir and you need to dump this out regularly or the thing will leak when you go to lift the top off to fill it with fresh water.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Macbeth

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist look perfect for white green house
customer_reviews.text: I recently got an indoor greenhouse for my humid loving plants and I needed a humidifier with an analog dial. I connected it to an ink bird humidity controller and it has been working great for me. The humidifier has a clean minimalist look which matches well with my white green house. The design is smooth and I looks great. Nice amount of mist put out too.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Just want to say love how fast I receive my purchase!!! It fits perfect on my night stand it's not big and bulky like other ones 🤗 tonight I will sleep better 😁 thanks for your service ❤
customer_reviews.author: marisol

customer_reviews.title: Good customer support, helping me sleep better
customer_reviews.text: In order to keep cool, I run my ceiling fan all night--which has been leaving me with a lot of sore throats. I had a feeling a humidifier might help, so I gave this one a try. The first model that arrived however, did not turn on--I attempted all the troubleshooting methods, but no dice. I contacted customer support, and within two days they had already shipped me a new one, and didn't ask me to send back the nonfunctional model. The new one works great! And as I suspected, it's helping me wake up with far fewer sore throats. It fits nicely on my night stand and is whisper quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Like it, should have bought one earlier
customer_reviews.text: Used it last night for first time and it was great, ran all night and still feels half full with the filtered water I used. I had it on the lowest level but it was baling water out easily and fully. I like that it doesn’t use scents and it’s a full and go. No water on my night table although my window was steamed up but what do you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Killala

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and when I opened the package water trickled out of the machine. I observed red stains on the humidifier around the reservoir. I decided to give it a try even though it was obviously pre used. When I put water in the reservoir and closed it water immediately started leaking out and not just a trickle. Buyer beware, I received a used machine even though it stated it was new. Clearly the seal doesn’t work, as water streamed out. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Quiet humidifier - perfect for sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I got my humidifier last week and really like it so far! As the weather gets cold, it gets really dry in my house, so the humidifier makes a big difference for my quality of sleep. It is quiet enough that it doesn't affect my sleep, but is able to release enough moisture into the air that I sleep better and don't wake up with my throat and skin feeling dry. It is easy to fill. I keep it on my bedside table and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Tayra

customer_reviews.title: Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Update - seller reached out and refunded so I will rate their response. Loved the product for 2 days - now it makes a horrible extremely loud buzzing sound every time I turn it on. It’s annoying to me and definitely can’t be used in my sons nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Messy to refill, constant refilling
customer_reviews.text: I got this mostly for my tropical plants for the winter season. So far I think it’s slightly raising the humidity level (maybe 10%) in the room that they’re in, but I have to set it to about 80-90% so i’m constantly refilling it. I use purified water, about 3 water bottles a day. Whenever I open it, there are puddles, water gets every where, and I have to get a rag to wipe it down before and after filling it back up. Invest in your humidifier, there are better options
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This little humidifier is very impressive. Instant vapor, no filters to clean, small, and easy to fill. The light on the front is a little bright but I covered it with tape. Great little humidifier for next to the bed or a small room.
customer_reviews.author: yooper_tr

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a humidifier after the winter months began creating a severe environment in our home. This is small but effective for a regular sized room (we use it for our bedroom). I do have to refill it every morning or before bedtime, but the varying amount of cool mist that it puts out is fantastic and it goes very well with our decor. It is very stylish looking and it gets the job done. Would recommend if you don't mind refilling the water daily.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Herriott

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is great for a bedroom! Keep in mind that if you run it constantly, you'll have to refill the water tank daily, possibly more depending on the setting it's on (it's pretty easy though). I sleep next to it and can't hear anything, so it's also very quiet. I use filtered water and don't get that white dust on my nightstand like some humidifiers. Great price point as well. *As a disclaimer, the seller does offer a $10 gift card if you leave a 5-star review. That being said, I haven't left anything out of my review.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is not easy to clean. I’ve been cleaning this humidifier every other day but there’s reddish grime stuck in an area that I cannot reach (the area of the humidifier where the mist would travel through)... I’ve had three other humidifiers and wanted a sleek smaller design that might be easier to clean, so I bought this. Overall the humidity is quiet and easy to use minus the cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it while the house was still feeling quite dry in late winter. We have a 1700 sf condo and it really makes a difference in the great room . At night we move it to our bedroom. It is quiet and the air is so nice!!! I have had a bad cold in the past week and this product has been a life saver!! It does as all humidifiers do, leave a light residue on furniture, small price to pay for how much better I feel each morning while I am getting over this cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, needs some improvement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this humidifier for my bedroom and it does the job well. Likes: Black color, welcome change from the usual Runs quietly Turn the knob to adjust amount of vapor Automatically shuts off when out of water Light is small, non distracting Needs improvement: Full tank is awkward to carry and place onto base Control knob is shallow, hard to grip
customer_reviews.author: TheGoodTheBad&TheUgly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and service
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic humidifier and even better customer service. Had an issue with my first unit but the company took great care and sent a replacement. The first unit was working well and was quite for about a month. After a while the motor started making noise. Contacted the company and provided video of the issue. They sent a replacement in no time. The replacement unit has been performing flawlessly for the last four months. Would highly recommend this humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Nice little humidifier for the money
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and is/was easy to setup. I keep it bedside and does not wake me up. I received a few more and now have three running around the house. I live in Southern California, where it tends to be dry (except for this month) I keep it on its lowest setting which seems to put out plenty of moisture into the air. These units are nice and small and easy to clean as well. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Klems

customer_reviews.title: Winter's friend
customer_reviews.text: I live in the northeast and winter is very brutal here. We have to turn on the heater at least 5-6 months a year. So, the air inside the house is very dry. Which is not good for me and my partner since we have sensitive skin. Also, it feels a bit uncomfortable about breathing when the air is very dry. I have found this device very useful to humidify the house. It's sleek and super quite. A very useful product.
customer_reviews.author: Upahar J

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet and a great stream!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier for my daughter because she was having some breathing issues and it has worked great for her! It's easy to fill up, clean up, and store away. I like that it's quiet the most but also that the vapor mist can be modified from low to heavy depending on how heavy you want your mist to be. I also like that it has an auto-shut off mechanism. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CatD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these for each of my children's upstairs bedrooms. We are living in a new construction house with great insulation and a wood stove. The kids were all having stuffy noses in their rooms at night and needed some moisture in their air. These work great and the kids easily set them up themselves, their ages are 9 to 16 years old. They are small enough to put on a desk or a night stand. One is even in a window sill. The humidifiers are sleek and not intrusive to the space.
customer_reviews.author: Elainacole

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Quiet Humidifer
customer_reviews.text: I run a humidifier almost every night to help with relaxing sinus pressure and lessening dry eyes. So, we have been through a lot of humidifiers. This one is really sleek and minimalistic in design, which I love, and it gives you more control for air flow. The dial lets you set it however you want. I do wish it held more water, but that just cuts down on how long the water sits in the tank. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: I Spy Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, easy and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Its simple to use and well designed, effective in small spaces, easy to clean and fill. I can adjust it so the water lasts longer, too. It’s also great looking, which is important to me. I use it for my tropical plants but I’m getting another for my bedroom. Cons: none really. My first one stopped working suddenly, and may have been user error. Customer support was great and replaced it right away. No issues since.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect, no noise at all
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. My wife is pregnant she was having problem with dry nasal. After starting using this humidifier she is feeling much better. Having much better sleep. Literally no noise when it plays. It’s super light and I cleaned it once with vinegar. So very easy to clean. We are living in the top floor,our room was very dry before we using this one. Now feeling good. I am 100% satisfied with this humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: AHMAD JAMI SAFAYET

customer_reviews.title: cute , small and work great
customer_reviews.text: Love this small humidifier that I purchased. I use it in my bedroom and it makes a big difference! It’s very quiet. You can barely hear it going at all , and provides the right amount of moisture to keep me breathing easy and helped with my nasal dryness. The size is perfect for my nightstand , and was very easy to assemble . I am happy with the purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and is very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Fresh out of its packaging, very easy to take apart and put back to add the water. Plugged it in. Works perfectly and is very quiet. I filled it up about 75% and on full blast it lasted 3 hours. Filled it to the top and it turned it on low setting it lasted 14 hours!!! Shipping was fast! Very satisfied, would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MISS KESHIA

customer_reviews.title: not sure about this
customer_reviews.text: It was super silent for the first week, and then started making whirring sounds. I have to jiggle and blow into the side vent to stop the noise. This is becoming annoying and will need to be replaced for next winter.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier is very good. The amount of fog is very large. It reaches the appropriate humidity in a short time. Basically, there is no sound. It feels very comfortable. The baby sleeps with the air conditioner. After a long time, his throat is very dry. When he wakes up, he always coughs. After using the humidifier, he will not. Pay attention to cleaning every day and use the air conditioner and humidifier correctly to keep away from various diseases.
customer_reviews.author: Ball

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier and a few month later is stopped working. Lights turn on, but the motor was dead. Customer service ws super helpful. They were polite and quick. Erica quickly resolved my problems and I was refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud Grinding Noise After One Month
customer_reviews.text: Makes a horrible loud gearing grinding nose half the nights. We liked it at first but after a month (can't return it now of course!) this loud nose started! It's awful, unusable when it does it. We've taken good care of it and the noise started on is own. No idea what to do now. I'm considering throwing it away and trying another brand. If it wasn't for noise I'd give it a 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Nuttall

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had gotten one sooner
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier peaked my interest because my sister had gotten one not too long ago. I hadn’t thought to get one of my own until I got a notification about a Flash sale featuring this product. I’ve had mine for a few weeks now and I LOVE it! It’s very well made and nice to look at with its sleek frame. My bedroom is honestly more like a small space jungle with all the plants and safari-like art I keep in it and this item fits right in! The noise is very minimal in the beginning and then silent afterwards when it’s turned on. I definitely recommend to people with nasal issues like me!
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice humidifier
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier looks really nice. There’s no noise and the steam is good enough. It’s not take a lot of space. I personally enjoy it for my small bed room. I have allergy sometimes in summer, and I recognize a big difference when having it in the room. I would recommend it if you live in a dorm or for your bed room.
customer_reviews.author: angie123

customer_reviews.title: that works.
customer_reviews.text: This is out in plain view on a plant stand in my bedroom, so I wanted it to be small, not ugly, and quiet. It is all of those things, and it works quite well. My plants, my pets, and my sinuses are happy. The machine is so quiet I can sometimes make out the soft drip of the water feeding into the machine from the reservoir, but that's about it. I read the reviews that mentioned spilling, so I lift the top straight up when take it to refill, and that works.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Eisen

customer_reviews.title: WOW AWESOME HUMIDIFIER!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Provides a smooth, quiet flow of cool humidity throughout the room. It's not super powerful. Over a 9 hour period it increased the humidity from 39% to 48% on a cool night in an average sized, closed bedroom. That's not bad, but it isn't great either. I wish it had a warm setting but the small stream of air doesn't seem affect the temperature of the room. No difference of temperature was recorded, which is good because I can use it during the winter.Overall, I think most customers will benefit from this humidifier and certainly get their money's worth. It's not bad quality but high end either. Personally, I can do without the complexity of some of those products.
customer_reviews.author: Taffee Hall

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and elegant!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a humidifier which is suitable for my baby. This one is very quiet and it’s easy to control the mist. And the shape is elegant just like a beautiful vase. What’s more, it can really save space in a two kids’ family. By the way, I love the clean white color of this humidifier which can calm me down during this hot summer. Would recommend to my friends who need one.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine

product_meta.title: TaoTronics Humidifiers for Bedroom, Cool Mist Humidifiers for Babies [BPA Free], 1.8L Quiet Ultrasonic Humidifier, Space-Saving, Filterless, Auto Shut Off-(1.8L/0.48 Gallon, US 110V)
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteTaoTronics – Enhance Your Life 
TaoTronics humidifiers add moisture to improve air quality for your home and office: relief the discomforts such as nasal congestion, skin and eye dryness; alleviate many common nuisances such as static electricity and cracks in furniture. Studies also show that the flu virus don't spread well in humidity. 

Key Features： 
Space saving design 
Straightforward dial knob controls 
Lightweight and slim 60oz/1. 8 L tank 
Improved build for quieter operation 
360° nozzle, smart LED indicator and intelligent protection

Specifications： 
Model: TT-AH026 
Power Source: AC 100V-240V 50/60Hz 
Power: 20W 
Water Tank: 1. 8L/60oz 
Mist Output: 210ml/7. 1oz/h (Max), 50ml/1. 7oz/h (Min) 
Work Environment: 5℃-45℃/41℉-113℉≤90%RH 

Package List： 
1 x TaoTronics humidifiers 
1 x User Guide 
1 x clean brush 

Warm Tips： 
1. Please do not add any essential oils into the humidifier. 
2. Please do not place this product on blankets or towels. 
3. Advise to use Distilled water for better air 
4. Please add vinegar for better cleaning 
5. The most comfortable environmental humidity is between 40%-60%. 

All TaoTronics humidifiers come with 18-month. If you have any questions, please contact us and we will respond within 24 hours.
feature_bullets: SPACE SAVING DESIGN: With vertical oval shape, it is a specially-designed cool mist humidifier for bedroom nightstand and office desk, fitting narrow space for better air wherever you are.

QUIET HUMIDIFIER FOR BABIES: Humidifying the air at a low noise level of just 32dB, intelligent air inlet design, FCC-certificated and BPA FREE material, perfect ultrasonic humidifier for baby room nursery and kids.
DIAL KNOB CONTROL: The mist output of this air humidifier can be conveniently adjusted for full control of the air you breathe.

EASY TO CLEAN HUMIDIFIER: lightweight and slim 60oz/1. 8L tank, the humidifier can be picked up with one hand for an easy clean and refill, provides ideal coverage for bedrooms, offices, and other medium-sized rooms.
POWERFUL FEATURES: 360° nozzle, smart LED indicator, and auto shut-off when waterless and tank is lifted up, surrounding you with clean fresh air for better sleep and better breathe.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars5,677 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: All taotronics humidifiers come with 18-month warranty . If you have any questions, please contact us and we will respond within 24 hours.
specifications.Included Components: 1 x TaoTronics humidifiers, 1 x User Guide, 1 x clean brush
